text:
We are a company
established in Ghent, in Belgium,
and we activate mainly

in the realm of automation
and service orchestration.

Our customers are in three major
verticals, in industrial IoT,

so Industry 4.0,
telecommunications and fintech.

We rely heavily on AWS
in order to deploy our solution.

AWS is essential for us
in order to be able

to provide the services to our
customers in different regions.

Moreover, we use
AWS and in particular

Amazon Bedrock, to enable
generative AI scenarios.

We have been relying
on Amazon Bedrock
and the Cloud 3.5 models
in order to enable

intent-based automation
for telecommunication services.

Other types of projects
that we address are related to

anti-money laundering solutions
in the fintech sector

and also everything
that has to do with field service
and proactive maintenance

in the industrials
and industrial IoT context.
By this we are capable

of creating scenarios like
 a mixture of agents, chatbots,

and other types of generative AI,
agentic workflows

for our customers,
on all three verticals.

The AWS team has helped us
migrate our solution on the

Amazon Cloud, also
has offered us various hints

or support for onboarding
Amazon services.

We are also using other services
like Amazon EKS, for example,
like Amazon QuickSight

and so on, in order to provide
comprehensive solutions
to our customers.

The customers of Waylay
benefit from the fact

that we use the Amazon platform
and the Amazon services

because for them
everything becomes transparent.
For 2025

we are looking at expanding our
footprint in the telecom industry

and AWS helps us there
to meet the stringent SLAs

that are required
by the industry.
